revised_title: Incompatibility and Incongruity: Two Different Mechanisms for Non-Functioning of Intimate Partner Relationships in Flowering Plants
tldr: The author discusses the non-functioning of pistil-pollen relationships in flowering plants and proposes a new theory based on matching genic systems resulting from co-evolution. The theory distinguishes between two mechanisms for non-functioning: incompatibility and incongruity. The author argues that the influence of the S gene has been overestimated, and the importance of incongruity has been underestimated.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
